publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3105.3 John Scott: National Waste Strategy-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3105.3) in the name of Ross Finnie, leave out from "commends" to end and insert "welcomes the preparation of draft area waste plans; regrets the slow progress being made towards ambitious recycling targets being set in the National Waste Plan; notes the need to build on work done already by local authorities, and recognises the need for community involvement and ownership of the problems of waste disposal at all levels to make a National Waste Strategy effective throughout Scotland."
